Nashville-Davidson.505 (Nashville): 505, previously known as 505 CST and Paramount, is a residential skyscraper in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, located at the intersection of Fifth Avenue and Church Street. 505 stands on the location originally intended for the cancelled Signature Tower. The 45-story building is 543 feet (166 m) tall and feature 403,000 sq ft (37,400 m2) of floor space.
